$MerlinPdpSectionContainer:AVAILABILITY_.listingTitle: Great View Of Prague & Old Town, 2 bedrooms, ROY

MerlinImage:102674990.accessibilityLabel: The living room window view: The Prague Castle

$MerlinPdpSectionContainer:DESCRIPTION_D.htmlText:
Great location in the center of Prague with unbeatable view of the Prague Castle and all Old Town! You will be in the city centre in 5 min of walking distance to sightseeing (Old Town Square, Astronomical Clock, Powder Tower, Tyn Church..), supermarkets, restaurants, shopping centre, bars..You can check in 24/7 or store your luggage here as long as you need. You can rent a pocket Wi-Fi or sim card with data! We will arrange a taxi pick up for you or book a parking in private garage.

Жилье

APARTMENT
• Great view: unbeatable view of the Prague Castle and of the Old Town (check out the photos)
• 2 bedrooms
• smart TV with Netflix
• Air-conditioned, central heated
• Free wifi, free local cellphone
• Our handbook with map to help you around
• Pet friendly
• Quiet place
• Child friendly - let us know and we will prepare the crib or child seat
• Double-glazed, sound dampening windows
• First-aid kit
• Fire-extinguisher

THE LIVING ROOM
• smart TV with Netflix
• Dolby Digital sound
• Super comfy sofa bed (foldable)
• Local mobile phone for free

THE KITCHEN
• Modern
• Nespresso coffee machine with capsules
• Fully equipped kitchen
• Huge fridge, Microwave, Oven, dishwasher
• Drinkable tap water
• Salt, pepper, sugar, oil, tea...

THE BEDROOM #1
• King sized bed, lamps
• 2 roof windows
• Clean bed sheets and towels
• Dresser
• A/C unit remote control

THE BEDROOM #2
• King sized bed, lamps
• 2 roof windows
• Clean bed sheets and towels
• Dresser
• A/C unit remote control

THE BATHROOM #1
• With a bathtub, a shower and a toilet
• Cute bathroom containg everything necessary for stay over: Mirror, Storage place, Iron, hairdryer
• Clean towels
• Underfloor heating
• Shower gel & shampoo

THE BATHROOM #2
• With new shover! and everything
• Cute bathroom containg everything necessary for stayover: Toilet, Shower, Mirror, Storage place, Iron, towels, hairdryer, washing machine
• Clean towels
• Shower gel & shampoo

THE BUILDING
• Building is over 100 years old
• Stylish entrance and hallway
• the elevator
• 24/7 access

Что доступно гостю

CHECK IN / CHECK OUT
• You can check in/out 24/7!
• The usual check in time is 2pm, check out time is 11am, but we are trying to be accomodating as much as possible.
• If you arrive sooner or want to leave later, you can leave your luggage in our apartment or in the locked hallway, take the key with you and come to pick your luggage anytime

ACCESS TO THE BUILDING / APARTMENT
• The apartment has a private access 24/7.
• There are 12 normal stairs and 15 stairs on spiral staircase from the elevator to the apartment

PARKING
• Parking in private secure garages about 2 min of walking distance
• Parking is for free, here are the measurements of the garage: max height is 1,9m, max width is 2,2m and max length is 5,2m.

Важная информация

RECOMMENDATIONS
• We are here to recommend you restaurants, bars, theaters and various of other activities, according to your preferences.
• There is a brochure in the apartment which helps you with basic info from recommendations, directions, addresses, phone numbers, internet connection, where to exchange money etc.
• We have a website with video guide, map of places and usefull information for your stay
• Do you want to know where to buy the best and cheapest beer in the center of Prague, where to go to the theater, where is the best swimming pool, what you shouldn't miss to see, etc.?
• Do you want to jump with a parachute, ride go-karts, or do you have other wishes?

POCKET WIFI, FREE CELL PHONE
• We also offer portable wi-fi or czech sim card for rent. With this service you will get a small device you can take with you and it will broadcast a fast internet connection wherever you move.
• Cellphone for local calls (reservations, taxi, Rob&Meg, ...) is in the apartment for free

FROM THE AIRPORT / TRAIN STATION
• We can arrange a taxi pick up for you from or to the airport, or a train station for a flat rate. We were able to set up a good prices for our guests.
• WiFi on board, English speaking drivers
• You can pay in CZK/EUR or with a credit card directly to the driver.
• The driver will wait for you in the arrival hall with a signboard with your name (or anything alse you wish to have on the signboard) :).

• Or you can take airport public transport to our apartment (every 30 minutes for 60 CZK) - the bus stop is 2 minutes from our apartment

SAFETY IN PRAGUE
Prague as a city is one of the safest city in the world. We heard that some rentals company for unknown reason have a problem with Czech, but no worry, it is a safe city.

__ In other words, we are here to make your stay perfect __
__ We love what we are doing. __

$MerlinPdpSectionContainer:HOST_PROFILE_.htmlText:
• We like personal approach, but also privacy.
• We welcome our guests when check in and give them information and recommendations
• We do like to communicate with them if they want to.
• We are happy to help with restaurants recommendations, cultural events, reservations and much more.
• Don't hesitate to ask, we are here to make your stay perfect and enjoyable.
• Sometimes you can communicate with our friends, they are part of our team.
Суперхозяин — это опытный хозяин с высокими оценками, который делает всё для комфорта гостей.

Having travelled through many countries we take our Airbnb hosting responsibilities seriously and will treat you as we’d like to be treated during our travels. We cover almost everything you need, as well as the things you didn’t realize you’d want :). We go above and beyond to make sure you are happy. You won’t have to worry about anything once you arrive except enjoying your stay and be just like home… only better :)

$MerlinPdpSectionContainer:HOST_PROFILE_.title: В целях безопасности не переводите деньги и не общайтесь за пределами сайта или приложения Airbnb.

$MerlinLocationDetail:neighborhood-previ.htmlText:
• The location couldn't be more exclusive
• It is in the centre of the Prague, but the street is quiet.
• Everything is near: Restaurants, sightseeings, cafees, culture, bars, pubs, gardens, shops.., you name it :).
• Easy to take a public transport that is really close - subway, tram, bus
• Next to the Old Town Square that is the start point for Prague tours

$MerlinLocationDetail:neighborhood-seeAl.htmlText:
• The location couldn't be more exclusive
• It is in the centre of the Prague, but the street is quiet.
• Everything is near: Restaurants, sightseeings, cafees, culture, bars, pubs, gardens, shops.., you name it :).
• Easy to take a public transport that is really close - subway, tram, bus
• Next to the Old Town Square that is the start point for Prague tours

$MerlinLocationDetail:getting around_369.htmlText:
WALKING DISTANCE
• Old Town Square (incl. Astronomical Clock) - 4min
• Wenceslas Square (incl. National Museum) - 10min
• Republic Square (incl.Palladium)- 3min
• Vltava river and boat tours - 7min
• Charles Bridge - 15min
• Prague Castle (incl. St Vitus Cathedral, Golden lane)- 26min
• Old Jewish Cemetery - 9min
• Secure parking - 2 min
• Tram and subway station - 3min

PUBLIC TRANSPORT
• Tram station Dlouha trida, or Republic Square - 3 mins
• Bus station Dlouha trida, or Republic Square - 3 mins
• Subway station Republic Square (B line, yellow) - 3 mins

PARKING
• Our secure and magic parking space - 2min

TRAIN
• Prague Main Station - 15 mins by foot

TAXI, CABS
• You can use UBER
• Or we will arrange fairly priced taxis
• Do NOT take taxi on street - expensive

Don't be loud in the hallway or in the house after 10 pm.
